name: phalcon-nova-mooc
description: A Mooc project developed with Phalcon, a PHP framework.

scripts.build: sudo rm -Rf postgres-data && docker-compose up -d --build && chmod 777 -Rf web/cache web/public/files web/phalcon.log
scripts.start: docker-compose up -d && chmod 777 -Rf web/cache web/public/files web/phalcon.log

author: Jérémy PASTOURET <pastouret.jeremy@gmail.com> (https://les-enovateurs.com/)
